madd.TwitchBot

Class TwitchInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • madd.TwitchBot.TwitchInterface

  • final class TwitchInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect to Twitch chat via IRC, and manage all communication.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.Thread INNER_THREAD_TIMER_CLOCK
      Secondary Thread running all timer related aspects.
      private static int mainTimer
      Count the number of seconds passed since the launch of the program.
      private static java.io.BufferedReader messageFromTwitch
      Handle all incoming messages from twitch IRC.
      private static java.io.PrintWriter messageToTwitch
      Handle all outgoing messages to twitch IRC.
      private static boolean programRunning
      Determine whether the primary timer should end.

      • openSocket

        Opens a socket and attempts to connect to Twitch IRC.

      • startBot

        private static void startBot()
        Start the bot running. All parsing of twitch IRC is done here.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Primary entry point.
        Parameters:
        args - Launch arguments, primary use for adding, editing and deleting sounds.
